doctor.name: Dr. Shahidul Islam Khandaker
doctor.degree: MBBS, MPH (Community Medicine), MPhil (Psychiatry), Fellow WHO (Thailand)
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Shahidul Islam Khandaker is a Psychiatrist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, MPH (Community Medicine), MPhil (Psychiatry), Fellow WHO (Thailand). He is a Senior Consultant, Psychiatry at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Modern Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Shahidul Islam Khandaker at Modern Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 5pm to 8pm (Sun, Mon & Wed).
